context:
* Withdrawal requests must be submitted to intlwithdrawal@gerogebrown.ca within Day 10 of the semester for refund process.
* Refund policies apply for withdrawals received by the International Withdrawal Team within the deadline.
* Refunds are made in Canadian currency and subject to foreign exchange rates at time of processing.
* The College is not liable for loss of funds due to currency exchange.
* Contact information: intlwithdrawal@gerogebrown.ca, 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559, ask.george@georgebrown.ca.
* Social Media Hub is available for more information and updates.
* Information on this website is subject to change without notice.
* Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
